userTypeCard.stylistBody: Reserve a space to operate your business from any salon in the world.
userTypeCard.shopOwnerBody: Manage each booth or space within your shop individually.

header.title: There are three types of fees that a reservation may have.
header.subtitle: Find a spot with the pricing model that works best for your business!

fixed.body: Pay a set rate for a set period of time

commission.body: Pay a set percentage of your revenue to the shop

fixedAndCommission.body: Pay a set minimum rate that increases with sales

bookReservationCard.title: Book your first reservation
bookReservationCard.body: Find an available booth for your specialization anywhere in the country.
